original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-01 13:56:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-02 23:33:16' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=62 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 17:10:30' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-07-31 18:48:36' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-02 23:33:16'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 62) AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 17:10:30' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-07-31 18:48:36')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2 AND postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-01 13:56:22'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.UserId=E2.UserId)
